title: Theta Tau Professional Engineering Fraternity
description: Served as Professional Development Chair at Sigma Delta Chapter, hosting quarterly events by leading resume workshops and interview preparations.

title: Girls Who Code
description: Served as Vice President at SD Miramar College, organizing and leading biweekly general meetings to teach coding fundamentals to students with minimal technical background and foster an inclusive environment.

title: Samahan Filipino American Performing Arts & Education Center
description: Performed as Company Dancer following apprenticeship, leading workshops to contribute to the preservation and development of tradition-based performing.
